Deprecated standard detected s.component2 = uint256(block.blockhash(block.number - 1)) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_075.sol#70):

detectors.description: Variable OpenAddressLottery.LuckyNumber (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_075.sol#15) is not in mixedCase

Reentrancy in OpenAddressLottery.participate() (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_075.sol#24-43):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(win) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_075.sol#38)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- reseed(SeedComponents(uint256(block.coinbase),block.difficulty,block.gaslimit,block.timestamp)) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_075.sol#42)
		- lastReseed = block.number (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_075.sol#57)
	- reseed(SeedComponents(uint256(block.coinbase),block.difficulty,block.gaslimit,block.timestamp)) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_075.sol#42)
		- secretSeed = uint256(keccak256()(components.component1,components.component2,components.component3,components.component4)) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_075.sol#51-56)
